name: GRASP
body:
![GRASP screenshot](http://mud.cz/sw/GRASP_UI.png)

Developed as a part of bachelor thesis [Visual Design of Ontologies for Semantic Web](http://mud.cz/sw/GRASP_thesis.pdf) which contains description and documentation of the editor.

## Dependencies

* Raptor >= 2.0.7
* Redland with Berkley DB support (tested 1.0.13)
* Rasqal (tested 0.9.25)
* Qt with QtSvg (tested 4.7)
tagline: A visual RDF & ontology proof-of-concept editor
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
